commits.author: Michael McCandless
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Nodes will be expanded if their depth (distance from the root node) is * <= this value and their number of arcs is >= * {@link #FIXED_ARRAY_NUM_ARCS_SHALLOW}. * *

* Fixed array consumes more RAM but enables binary search on the arcs * (instead of a linear scan) on lookup by arc label. * * @return true if node should be stored in an * expanded (array) form. * * @see #FIXED_ARRAY_NUM_ARCS_DEEP * @see Builder.UnCompiledNode#depth */ private boolean shouldExpand(Builder builder, UnCompiledNode node) { return builder.allowArrayArcs && ((node.depth <= FIXED_ARRAY_SHALLOW_DISTANCE && node.numArcs >= FIXED_ARRAY_NUM_ARCS_SHALLOW) || node.numArcs >= FIXED_ARRAY_NUM_ARCS_DEEP); }
commits.sourceOld:
/** * Nodes will be expanded if their depth (distance from the root node) is * <= this value and their number of arcs is >= * {@link #FIXED_ARRAY_NUM_ARCS_SHALLOW}. * *

* Fixed array consumes more RAM but enables binary search on the arcs * (instead of a linear scan) on lookup by arc label. * * @return true if node should be stored in an * expanded (array) form. * * @see #FIXED_ARRAY_NUM_ARCS_DEEP * @see Builder.UnCompiledNode#depth */ private boolean shouldExpand(UnCompiledNode node) { return allowArrayArcs && ((node.depth <= FIXED_ARRAY_SHALLOW_DISTANCE && node.numArcs >= FIXED_ARRAY_NUM_ARCS_SHALLOW) || node.numArcs >= FIXED_ARRAY_NUM_ARCS_DEEP); }
